feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 11 Aug 2023 16:01:27
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Researchers from Stanford and Google have created an AI village with 25 bots that interact and engage in activities.
- Browsers do not prioritize the HTTP status code of web pages.
- A new Tetris game features blocks that are ARM instructions executed in the browser.
- VR in the workplace can lead to various health issues.
- Setting JavaScript framework standards and discussing the flaws of the React-set standard.
- Sensor Watch offers a board swap for the classic Casio F-91W wristwatch.
- Waymo and Cruise have received permits to operate robotaxis for money in SF, LA, and Silicon Valley.

Business:
- Country Garden plans to pay its chairperson $28 million in dividends, attracting attention from bondholders due to her $5.3 billion fortune.
- X (formerly Twitter) has reduced requirements for its ad revenue sharing program.
- Elon Musk's X Ads Revenue Sharing payments have been distributed.
- A Canadian woman received over 50 packages of women's shoes she never ordered and was asked to pay collect-on-delivery fees.
- Proposed Cybercrime Treaty's international cooperation provisions may have negative implications.
- Waymo and Cruise have obtained permits for full-day robotaxi operations.

AI:
- The AI village created by researchers from Stanford and Google consists of 25 bots that engage in various activities.
- X (formerly Twitter) has made changes to its ad revenue sharing program.
- Elon Musk's X Ads Revenue Sharing payments have been delivered.
- Robotaxis have received approval to operate 24/7 in California.

Other:
- An interactive story focused on self-exploration.
- Adults appreciate Van Gogh's art due to their infancy experiences.
- Free live stream of the Japan vs. Sweden Women's World Cup match.
- Websites and APIs on Render are currently unavailable due to Cloudflare network errors.
- Olivia Rodrigo has released a new song and a new Instagram feature.
- The Samsung Galaxy Flip 5 has made important design tweaks.
- The gig economy's impact on Covid-19.
- Comparing virtual vs in-person immersive leadership training.
- Arizona's Michael Wiley is considered the most underrated player in the Pac-12.
- Tips on earning, using, and maximizing United Miles.
- Solar flares have disrupted radio signals across the US.
- The potential implications of the proposed Cybercrime Treaty's international cooperation provisions.
- The Wordle game hints, clues, and answers for a specific date.
- Travel credit cards with benefits worth more than the annual fee.
- The drawbacks of building communities on Slack.

Insights:
- The development of AI villages showcases advancements in artificial intelligence and its potential applications.
- Changes in ad revenue sharing programs indicate evolving strategies in the tech industry.
- The impact of the gig economy on the post-pandemic recovery.
- The potential risks and benefits of virtual and in-person leadership training.
- The influence of childhood experiences on adult appreciation of art.
- The challenges and opportunities in the cybersecurity landscape.
- The disruption caused by solar flares on communication systems.
- The importance of user experience and design in technology products.
- The implications of international cooperation provisions in cybercrime treaties.
- The unexpected consequences of online shopping and delivery systems.
- The value and limitations of travel credit cards.
- The evolving landscape of transportation with the introduction of robotaxis.
